<<<<<<< HEAD
A Declaration of the several treasons, blasphemies and misdemeanors acted, spoken and published against God, the late King, his present Majesty, the nobility, clergy, city, commonalty, &c. by that grand wizard and impostor William Lilly of St. Clements Danes, other wise called Merlinus Anglicus presented to the right honourable the members of the House of Parliament : in order to secure him from acting any further villanies against His Majesty. Gadbury, John, 1627-1704. Lilly, William, 1602-1681.
[4], 7 p.
Printed for Dan. White ..., London : 1660.
Sometimes attributed to John Gadbury. Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
=======
A Declaration of the several treasons, blasphemies and misdemeanors acted, spoken and published against God, the late King, his present Majesty, the nobility, clergy, city, commonalty, &c. by that grand wizard and impostor William Lilly of St. Clements Danes, other wise called Merlinus Anglicus presented to the right honourable the members of the House of Parliament : in order to secure him from acting any further villanies against His Majesty. Gadbury, John, 1627-1704. Lilly, William, 1602-1681.
[4], 7 p.
Printed for Dan. White ..., London : 1660.
Sometimes attributed to John Gadbury. Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
Dan. White
